issue.title: [CF 924] Unit NPC ID does not work for raid bosses
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. set up a bar group using the string posted below
2. target Immerseus

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
you should see a bar group on the right

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v6.2.6

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no error thrown

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
When I change the condition to evaluate unit's name and change the reference value to Immerseus it works as expected. (See attached screenshots.)
Also matching NPC ID works fine for regular NPCs.
--
